# wup-template



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                                   | Type     | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `color`      | `color`       | The color of the icon, defaults to the main color of the app. | `string` | `undefined` |
| `height`     | `height`      | The height of the icon, defaults to 100%.                     | `string` | `'100%'`    |
| `name`       | `name`        | The name of the icon.                                         | `string` | `undefined` |
| `publicPath` | `public-path` | Used to set the public path to recover the assets.            | `string` | `'/build'`  |
| `type`       | `type`        | The type of the icon, defaults to "svg".                      | `string` | `'svg'`     |
| `width`      | `width`       | The width of the icon, defaults to 100%.                      | `string` | `'100%'`    |
